entry.title: LaTeX: the open source document system for academia
entry.summary:
I'm to take a session at FUDCon India Pune this Saturday on LaTeX. I just finished with my presentation for the session. Feel free to use it (non commercially). If you need the source, please drop me an email and I'll send it across.

To get the FUDCon India logo â€¦
entry.content:
I'm to take a session at FUDCon India Pune this Saturday on LaTeX. I just finished with my presentation for the session. Feel free to use it (non commercially). If you need the source, please drop me an email and I'll send it across.

To get the FUDCon India logo in your Beamer presentation, use the following command:

logo{includegraphics[width=1.5cm,angle=270]{logo-fudconin.pdf}}

The pdf version of the logo can be downloaded from here.

See you at the FUDCon!!
